title: Quantum Poem
desc: A tribute to Outer Wilds in react. The poem changes when you refresh or click the page.

title: Does The Shark Die
desc: A site for checking if a shark dies in a movie. Jaws would have devastated me as a kid so being able to check would have been helpful.

title: GitHub Stats
desc: My personal version of the test site my GitHub Stats program creates

title: SamaritanGPT
desc: A Person of Interest Samaritan inspired ChatGPT web interface

title: Stacker
desc: A vue.js version of the popular arcade machine. Now with extra customization!
